allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
feat: complete UI overhaul for earnings page

- Redesigned header with 32px bold title and teal toggle buttons
- Created reusable StatCard component with colored icons
- Built 2x2 stats grid: Total Earned, Hours, Jobs, Pending Pay
- Added gradient pay rate card with border
- Created WorkHistoryCard component with job details layout
- Applied consistent color scheme (#1F2937 cards, #10B981 teal accent)
- Larger typography (32px values, 28px pay rate)
- Proper spacing with rounded-2xl corners
- Status badges: teal for paid, yellow for pending

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")

Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Fix alerts/notifications to be provider-specific

- Add debug logging to trace leads and alerts per provider
- Add new alert types: overdue jobs and jobs needing crew assignment
- Expand Needs Attention section with 4 alert categories:
  - Overdue jobs (red) - past scheduled time but not completed
  - Jobs needing crew (orange) - no workers assigned to upcoming jobs
  - Unpaid invoices (amber) - pending/sent invoices
  - New leads (purple) - matched/new leads for the provider
- All alerts are properly filtered by providerId
- Add proper singular/plural grammar for alert counts

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")
